TopicTitle: "kopernicus was not able to load the custom planetary system"

Articles.Content:
Hello,

I am working my my first planet mod with kopernicus  but nothing I do can seem to get past this error :

"kopernicus was not able to load custom planetary system"

I have linked the mod and log files as recommended.

ANYTHING helps, Thanks!

 

Google drive with all info

I've figured out one problem but now I have another...

"Configuration.Loader: Failed to load Body: Gonorix/Gonorix: Unable to read beyond the end of the stream."

I have not been able to find anything on the topic.

Any Ideas?

fixed

 

READ ENTIRE KOPERCUS LOG. IT COULD HELP

Edited November 21, 2022 by QDogTheBest
Directs others to sorce of problem

Having the same error. The logs tell me it's failing to load Ceres. I've uninstalled, reinstalled, reset my computer, switched to 1.12.3 and even 1.12.2 , deleted all my mods and reinstalled what I could remember through ckan twice and I can't figure out what's wrong and why it broke all of a sudden.
I would recommend to read the ENTIRE error in your log. That pointed me to the scale version, witch was the problem for me. Yours might me different. I can try to help if you send your .cfg file.
